website_summaries.verdict: The Mr. Coffee brand has been a reliable choice for decades. The retail price is competitive, and customers praise its durability and consistency.
pros: This is the standard by which most iced tea makers are measured
Sturdy plastic carafe holds a generous amount of tea, and the brewer accepts both loose and bagged teas
cons: As with other iced tea brewers, a significant amount of ice is required to cool the beverage down
Parts must be perfectly aligned to avoid leakage, and cleaning can be a chore

customer_reviews.title: Cracked pitcher and altered design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old unit which failed at the switch after about 30 years of daily use. I had replace the steeping basket and pitcher a time or 2 over the years. The new one arrived with a useless pitcher with a cracked bottom. See the photo, zoom in, crack is from the center toward 3:00. Very disappointing but I still had my old pitcher. The new models don’t have a spring controlled steeping basket which means you need to use a coffee filter to slow the process. This gives less control over the desired strength of the tea. I highly doubt this new unit will last 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: Barb the baker

customer_reviews.title: saves plastic bottles
customer_reviews.text: I love tea and was buying prepackaged but trying to reduce plastic usage. This makes very good tea, a little fuss with water and ice, but no big deal. The cord is only about 18" long - ridiculously short, so just be aware if you need to use it anywhere but right next to an outlet you will need extension cord. But again, the tea it makes is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Coelho

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, the old pan works better
customer_reviews.text: Got this one with high hopes but after using, not so much. It works fine but in the time it takes to brew tea, I could have already boiled water and let my tea bags set for 5 minutes. Much less hassle I think w/the old tea pan and fewer parts to clean later. No, if you have a stove I wouldn't recommend this to replace the tea pan - unless you need more stuff to clean and something that takes up more instead of less of your time.
customer_reviews.author: Manasseh

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to have
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for Christmas. It was to replace to 15 year old one that broke a few months earlier. She loved it but the pitcher cracked not even 2 months in. The replacements arent expensive, but it was a bummer that it happened.
customer_reviews.author: Cortnee Newton

customer_reviews.title: Good product easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Used only for iced tea. Product worked as advertised. Completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: NFD

customer_reviews.title: Love this tea maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea maker. Hand wash your pitcher as the heat from dishwasher can eventually lead to cracking or warping. This is my second one and I really enjoy using it brew tea.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Soliz

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding tea maker
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that we have had and hopefully it will last as long as the first one. We got well over eight years usage out of the one we had to finally replace. That is actually quite a long time for just about any appliance, big or little nowadays. Again, works great and is very easy to both use and store away. If you haven't got one, give it a try, I'm sure you'll really like it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: My lifeline every morning
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea brewer! It is easy to use, brews quickly, and makes really great tasting iced tea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Where has this machine been my whole life? I’m in love. Easy to use... I’m saving tons of money not going through Starbucks every morning and am having fun playing around with different flavored teas. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kortney dodd

customer_reviews.title: Pitcher cracked in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Although, this Iced tea maker is easy to use, the bottom of the pitcher cracked and now leaks, so it really isn’t useful now. Very disappointed. Save the money and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: so I bought this one and we have been using it and really like it. We believe it is much easier and ...
customer_reviews.text: We had an older one that we needed to replace, so I bought this one and we have been using it and really like it. We believe it is much easier and safer to use than to heat up the stove etc. to make tea.
customer_reviews.author: BDawson

customer_reviews.title: replacement for one identical that lasted 12 years. so ...
customer_reviews.text: replacement for one identical that lasted 12 years. so far, it works well. order to ship to delivery very quick

customer_reviews.title: The tea maker is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tea maker as a gift for my daughter for Christmas. She has used this brand of tea maker for years but it was time for a new one.

customer_reviews.title: Quality tea maker
customer_reviews.text: Well made.....I use this every day and, in-fact, purchased two more to give to friends. Tea maker was packed well and sent fassssst! Thank you.

customer_reviews.text: I use to have a tea maker that looked like this 1 only mine would let the tea bags seep as long as you wanted them to seep. This 1 does not so I returned it.

customer_reviews.title: Ice tea made this way just tastes better you can add your sweetener and change the strength ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a long lasting product. We just replaced this model with our model from 20+ years ago. Ice tea made this way just tastes better you can add your sweetener and change the strength of it

customer_reviews.title: Tea in a hurry
customer_reviews.text: Works great , easy to use, fast and the tea taste great👍

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought in 25 years, we love it
customer_reviews.author: A P

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Have used this one for over15 yrs  this isy third one i have outlated 2
customer_reviews.text: nothing to add used this particular one for over 15 yrs. very satisfie
customer_reviews.author: Ken Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! The problem with the carafe still hasn't been addressed, it will not latch under the brew basket. A mess is in the works if your not careful with the placement of carafe during the brewing cycle. I could not find any direction on filling the reservoir ie; how much water is needed for proper brewing.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell J Pantak

customer_reviews.title: Now I give it for the perfect wedding shower gift
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. Now I give it for the perfect wedding shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H. McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Works Extremely Well
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd tea maker we've ordered...my wife left the container too close to the heating element (it must have been touching?) in the dishwasher, and sure we could have replaced just the container, but for a few bucks more, we could order the whole thing. Use it at least once a week. No leaking, brews quick. Delivery was extremely quick too. Love this tea maker. Picked this, again, over some other Mr. Coffee models because of claims that they leaked on the counter. Not this one, it hasn't leaked at all...just keep the container away from the element in your dishwasher, and you should be good.
customer_reviews.author: G. F.

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but the larger one is just better.
customer_reviews.text: If your a snobby tea drinker you probably wont like this one.... the larger version uses a shower like arm to spray the tea while this version just sort of pours the hot water on one spot scalding a portion of the leaves and requiring you to use two coffee filters instead of one. Overall the 3qt version is just a better deal and only a little more expensive. Still need to buy those pesky coffee filters though.
customer_reviews.author: joe k

customer_reviews.title: My model does not have a plug I can open and close.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand. You all talk about closing the plug but my model does not have one. The older model I had did have one of these but mine does not. It recommends I use Mr. Coffee coffee filters though. Is that true with everyone? Also, it make only 1Qt of tea not 2 if you fill to water line. I'm about to call the company to complain.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Logan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a quick and easy way to make ice tea on those hot summer days, well worth having.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Glascock

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the cheaper model at WalMart
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a cheaper model at WalMart but it started leaking after a short time. This one is like our previous model that we are still using in a second home after years of service.
customer_reviews.author: gerry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and store after use
customer_reviews.text: Makes Iced tea in a hurry, takes a time or two to find the right combination of tea bags. Easy to clean and store after use.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Roeder

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever Iced Tea Maker
customer_reviews.text: I had received my first Mr. Coffee Iced Tea Maker many years ago and recently when it decided to quit working I went shopping for a replacement. There was only a newer model available locally and I did purchase it, but was very disappointed. After a couple of months, I went on-line to see if I could find the "old" type model and when I did, I purchased 2. I am very happy with my new Mr. Coffee Tea Maker and I love the new yellow color. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Iced Tea Lover

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised. I only wish the capacity ...
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. I only wish the capacity was larger.

customer_reviews.author: Fred Hartleb

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the size and quality of this product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Mr. Coffee tea maker. We wore the first one out. Very pleased with the size and quality of this product.

customer_reviews.title: Do not like the way this model is made
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the way this model is made. You can't see the water level when you fill it. It also is clumsy & leaks while making. Parts are ackward to use. Too big to store. I wish they symtikl made the original model. No idea why they changed that. This is my second one that leaks. I now need to return this, which is a hardship

customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and a great price. I got this for my mother for Christmas. Her last Mr. Coffee Iced Tea Maker made it 10 years and finally stopped working. So naturally I got her another one. This one is holding up great and doesn't make a huge mess when in use.

customer_reviews.title: it's the only one
customer_reviews.text: im glad that amozon had mr coffee tea maker the round picture one i mean. dont go to walmart kmart because they only sell mr coffee tea maker with sq.pitcher and they leak.

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Coffee Makes Great Iced Tea
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product makes terrific freshly brewed iced tea. If you are an iced tea addict like I am, this is for you!

customer_reviews.title: Wish they had kept the older model
customer_reviews.text: This is a far cry from the previous Mr. Coffee Iced Tea Maker I had. Hate the design... Strongly hate it. I really just wanted to keep using my old model, but can't find a pitcher replacement only for it. Plus, the old ones are very hard to find and overpriced now if you find one. So, I'm stuck with this since it's better than nothing.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas since he drinks so much sweet tea. He uses it at least every other day and it works how it should. No problems and we save some money since he doesn't go out to buy tea.

customer_reviews.title: Good for as long as it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Wirks great but the pitcher crajed and srarted keaking in less than 6 months.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Buy.  Easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: lasts forever

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast ship
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fast ship! I Love it! It's smaller than my last machine but I like that. My hubby makes me the perfect iced teas with this maker. Yum yum is all I can say!

customer_reviews.title: It works just fine, though I wish it would stay in the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine, though I wish it would stay in the holding area a little longer to brew like the one I had for many many years

customer_reviews.title: Why Buy Anything Else?
customer_reviews.text: Why waste money on the more expensive models, some of which go for over $200? This one does the job. Sure, it may only last 3-5 years with lots of use, but you will have gotten your money's worth.

customer_reviews.title: mr coffee ice tea maker
customer_reviews.text: This is our sixth one, we use it until it just gives up. Fantastic product, highly recommend it to anyone who loves fast and easy ice tea, great flavor and you can adjust the strength.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: A little cheaper than the one I had years ago, but just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Bilsby

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as I had expected
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this tea maker model for many, many years and still love it! Only replace it when the pitcher tends to look at bit worn.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: got one because I liked the one my friend has. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Doggy

customer_reviews.title: Long time ago my wife purchased one of these, ...
customer_reviews.text: Long time ago my wife purchased one of these, looks exactly the same but a lighter shade of blue. Her's is about 10 years old, still works but leaks a bit. She said our friend bought one but it didn't last long and it looked a bit different! Hopefully this will last as long as her original!
customer_reviews.author: WaltsWorker

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for every day use!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Mr. Coffee Iced Tea Maker and the second of this model. I love the yellow color, and I love the operation of this unit. I make at least one pitcher of tea per day with this machine. There are two excellent ways to get rid of the tea stains on the pitcher, lid and filter. The best way is to soak them in hot water with OxyClean in it. The tannin stains completely disappear. The second best way is to use a Mr. Clean Magic Eraser (or generic product of the same type). I highly recommend this Iced Tea Maker.
customer_reviews.author: mericat

customer_reviews.title: convenient enough for daily use!
customer_reviews.text: This makes refreshing iced tea very conveniently. Originally, I received one as a gift and used it for many years, many times each week until it was "used up" so couldn't consider just any replacement. It had to be Mr. Coffee Iced Tea Maker.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina H. Cox

customer_reviews.title: It makes great iced tea
customer_reviews.text: It does what it suppose to do. It makes great iced tea.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: tea maker
customer_reviews.text: It works good but I still prefer my older Mr.Coffee tea maker with the teal green lids. This one has a funky spring loaded brew stopper which I don't like and the basket is a little bit deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Coax09

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Have emjoyed my ice tea Simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: City Girl

customer_reviews.title: Still The Best
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift after my friend enjoyed perfect iced tea from my 20 year old Mr. Coffee Tea Maker and even with her now high tech kitchen this product is still the best.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Anne Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: great seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a spare and have used it several times. It works like it should and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great Tea
customer_reviews.text: I have used this type of tea maker for years. Normally I get about 7 or 8 years out of the Tea Maker. easy to use, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this brewing system
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this brewing system. Liked the older version much better. It made more tea and the pitchers were bigger
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Dearden

customer_reviews.title: bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Easier more consistent brewing. Only be better if it was a commercial brewer. At home use does the job tho.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M. Eguia

customer_reviews.title: It does what I wanted. If it lasts as ...
customer_reviews.text: It does what I wanted. If it lasts as long as the first one that I had it will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Linhardt

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this same maker for my father about 15 years ago. He still uses his and loves it. I just started making my own tea and he talked me into getting the same model. It is very simple to use. It is basic with no bells and whistles. You simply put in your water, put in tea and appropriate amount of ice, plug in and press button. For storage, the pitcher fits over top the unit. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Poppyseed

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I have had several of these over the years. They work great
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wayne Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Better than others I've had
customer_reviews.text: Only gripe is the water reservoir is too small. We like strong tea and have to load the reservoir twice to get the tea made. HEY MANUFACTURERS, LISTEN UP - MAKE ONE LIKE THIS, BUT A LARGE WATER RESEVOIR!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gsanbrook

customer_reviews.title: Thought was like I had
customer_reviews.text: I am getting the hang of it but when making the purchase thought was just like I had before but isn't. Takes several pots to make what I was making in the old one but I will get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: rockergal

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy...
customer_reviews.text: Use a good tea and you won't have to add tons of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Booger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes great iced tea. Easy to use and keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: bj

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and it makes great iced tea.recommend using 8 tea bags if you like sweet tea. Handy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Slayer

customer_reviews.title: Coffee would make them like the ones the first made
customer_reviews.text: it is okay but I would Mr. Coffee would make them like the ones the first made. They were so much easier and better to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Burton

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: The top of this pitcher (the blue part) does not have a manual lever on the side of the basket to allow the tea to "steep". This basket just allows the water to drain through the basket into the pitcher and the tea is very weak when finished brewing.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Iced Tea Maker
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery haven't used yet but, looks like everything is in tack. Thanks very much.
customer_reviews.author: Shazam

product_meta.title: Mr. Coffee Iced Tea Maker
product_meta.description: Thirsting for a better iced tea maker? With the ability to make 2 quarts of brewed iced tea, this machine is a great choice for iced tea lovers. And the removable brew basket means youll spend less time on cleanup, leaving more time to enjoy your delicious iced tea.
feature_bullets: Use tea bags or loose tea leaves to brew great-tasting iced tea
Makes iced tea easily with convenient automatic shutoff
Pitcher has sturdy handle for steady pouring
Removable brew basket for easy cleaning

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars145 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
